alert.note: Alert for Kane; Lake; McHenry; Northern Cook (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 11:41PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lake, northern Kane, McHenry and northwestern Cook Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1141 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Harvard to Marengo to Genoa. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elgin, Waukegan, Arlington Heights, Evanston, Schaumburg, Palatine, Skokie, Des Plaines, Mount Prospect, Hoffman Estates, Glenview, Buffalo Grove, Crystal Lake, Carpentersville, Wheeling, Northbrook, North Chicago, Gurnee, Mundelein and Algonquin. This includes... Oakton Community College, College of Lake County, Great Lakes Naval Training Center, Harper College, IL Beach State Park, Lake County IL Fairgrounds, Lake Forest College, Mchenry County College, Mchenry County Fairgrounds, Moraine Hills State Park, Ravinia Music Festival, and Six Flags Great America. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
